scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run server
scripts.production: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run server
scripts.production:dev: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run server
scripts.production:win: npm run build && set NODE_ENV=production && cd server && node server.js
